title: Life is Good & Lag Free with iPhone SE
Four Stars
Power in pocket size
Amazing Phone.
Best ever experience of mobile phone
Great product.
Beautiful
4" winner in 2017 and 2018
Happy to receive an Indian assembled Iphone <3
One of the best iPhone!!!
review:
I use to use Android from Froyo version since 2011. Being an avid user of
android, I still shifted to iOS. No matter how costly your android phone is,
it will start lagging, over heating, sudden battery draining. As a result you
have face regular resetting of your android phone. iPhone is just a fresh wind
on all those irritating problems. Read carefully my review, which I have
posted after 2months of use.  
Pros:  
1) No lag, while atleast 60/70 apps running in background even.  
2) Stunning photography could be done.  
3) Highly sensitive auto brightness sensor. Changes the light very quick.  
4) Google can be synced.  
5) Contacts can be saved in Google directly. As a result, if you use an
android phone & login through same Google account, your iPhone contacts will
show on android phone. Simultaneously if you save a contact at google, that
will reflect on your iPhone too. Just you need to keep Google auto sync mode
on in iPhone. Life is good.  
6) 4K video is a pure charm once you watch it on your laptop.  
7) Buy a gorrilapod @ ₹600, mount the phone on it, start slow motion video &
leave it for an hour during sunrise or sunset. Just see the magic. A pure time
lapse vide you would find. People call is SloMo with hashtag. Later transfer
the video to your pc & delete it from phone to free up the storage.  
8) iPhone's 360degree photo, Square photo is iconic. Shoot a panorama pic &
post it on facebook, it'll be converted into 360deegree.  
9) So far no heating issue.  
10) Very very fast charging. It gets 1% to 45% in less than 15mins.  
  
Cons:  
1) Average battery life. With power saver it can go upto 1.5 days. Without
saver I use it for entire the day.  
2) In the era of 5.5 inch & 6 inch smartphones, this 4 inch screen is really
little tough to get habituated. Nothing much, the very first issue you'd face
is typing error or typo. If you are habitual using with 5 inch or bigger
screen, it will be little difficult to move your finger tips on proper
alphabets. You want to write 'A', enough possibility is there that you would
press on 'S' instead 'A'. But be assured, you'll be habituated within 2 weeks
time.  
3) If you are bigger screen user, you might not like the video size in lower
screen size.  
But above two points are really ignorable. Human nature is based on their
habit. You'll be habituated with 4 inch screen, no worry.  
4) Truecaller will work but not live. Apple won't any third party app to
compromise it's user's privacy, not even if the user himaelf wants to. After
the call, you need to copy the number & paste to Truecaller. It will work this
way.  
5) iPhone is not yours if you are multi sim user & do not want to keep more
than single phone.  
Class says all. iPhone is meant for class users, who keeps single phone for
making & receiving calls. Unlike those use who keep Jio for outgoing &
Vodafone for incoming.  
Jokes a part lol.  
6) Storage is a real issue for this phone. These days 32gb is can not be
enough for Vloggers like me. Again 64gb or 128gb version doesn't support my
pocket. Hence...  
  
Conclusion:  
If you are confident, you could adjust with smaller screen size than your
Android, if you could adjust little less battery backup, go for iPhone SE.
Because rest is all better than android. You'll get a pure lag free phone.
iPhone SE will never disappoint you by it's performance. Way better phone than
any bigger screen, long battery backed up Android phones.  
  
Posting few pictures taken by my iPhone SE at Darjeeling.  
  
Thus, I conclude & rest my unbiased opinion. Happy shopping.  
  
Sumanta Chatterjee  
Kolkata

Rattle sound when you tap on camera on 32GB Models.

I phone SE(32 GB):  
Battery backup amazing as compare to my old Redmi Note3. After moderate use of
day I still get 25% battery in evening  
Performance is far better than any 3GB or 4GB android phone.Never lags in
multitasking  
Camera: Quality of photos are some what good. Performance of 1.2 M Front
camera is great in day light . Never feel about lower pixel of front camera.  
Build quality is amazing . Compact and powerful device. Initially feel about
small size but later on you will not feel about it.  
Warranty and product is genuine and original .

Totally in love with the phone. Although i use it as my secondary phone which
means no social media and only work phone. i get an amazing 2 day battery back
up. Good phone and to my surprise it did not get obsolete with the launch of
iphone 8 and iphone X.

Best ever experience of mobile phone, this is my first iPhone which I could
get under my budget with updated technology and features, I found it lightning
fast, It runs without any lag even while operating multiple apps at a time.
Rear camera is unbeatable among the same range of mobiles available in market.
Person who is searching phone under the range of 15 to 20k budget should try
it once if screen size doesn't matter much.

This is my first iPhone as I’ve been an android user till now and experience
has been great so far.  
I was apprehensive of buying this phone online but after 3 days of usage i can
say the it was a correct decision. Order is completely geniune and came nicely
packed. No issues so far. Updated to ios11 and it’s great. A good buy for 19k.
Anyone who loves small screen phone and wants to move to iPhone. This is it!

Good phone;  
no need at all to fit any accessories; I fitted tempered glass but I don't
think for a phone which costs Rs.26000/- can be protected with Rs.100/-
Tempered Glass!  
Also that "feeling of Apple" gets eliminated if you fit tempered glass!  
So I request not to fit it.....  
Enjoy the original Apple device...That's better.

Shifted back to 4" after two year. The best phones I had used recently iPhone

I have receive an Indian assembled Iphone. Thank u amazon for that. Really
proud of it. No words after all it a master design in software & hardware.
When android offer 4-6 GB rams for smooth operations for the present time,
Iphone can provide better performance in 2 GB ram. There are more advantages
that can beat other android phones in same category.

First of all, this phone is assembled in India and not in China. Do not get
bothered about the hype of small size screen, which maybe the biggest concern
for whoever is purchasing this model, everything blends in nicely if you're
not expecting a 6s Plus size screen. This model comes with preloaded iOS 11.
Than there is this premium hands on feel of the product. Camera is nice,
Headphone jack is still available in this model. So far I have not found out
anything against the phone apart from a little 'faster than expected' battery
consumption.
